result.title: Getting Started with Codeforces
result.content:
I am not too sure if these blog posts are going to help anyone. These are basically for my own reference.

I half-heartedly participated in Codeforced Round #265 (Div. 2) last night. The performance was well, abysmal. I could pass the pretests for just the problem A and I made some mistake in memory allocation there, so at the end of the day, I made no submissions after all.

Clearly, much more practice is needed. I have planned to try all div2 rounds in 260 series till contest #266 starts. Will continue posting more updates on that front.
